News.Title: Mittal Life Style Limited: Secures ₹5 Crore Denim Fabric Orders from Major Retailers
News.Summary: Mittal Life Style Limited has received orders worth ₹5 crore to supply 2 lakh meters of denim fabrics to vendors of Arvind Lifestyle Brands Limited and Myntra Designs Private Limited. The contract allows for potential quantity increases. The company has completed most of the order execution and attributes the demand to positive response to its specialized denim products.
